name: A hidden stash
A stash of junk
A rotten box.
msg: You stumble upon a stash of random junk and other odds and ends.
You trip on a box. It seems to only contain junk, but hey, you might get lucky.
A broken box is in the ground. It is covered in moss and is partially rotten.

success.msg: You find something in the stash.

fail.msg: You cannot seem to find anything of use.
